Question: HOMEE AI Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HOMEE AI Co., Ltd.

Product: World's First A.I. Interior Designer at CES 2024

- Introduces the world’s first A.I. interior designer, utilizing spatial planning technology to transform the furniture industry
- Offers cloud-based subscription A.I. software-as-a-service for furniture manufacturers, real estate developers, and interior design firms
- Allows users to redesign rooms by scanning with their smartphones, with the A.I. generating a new image while keeping room measurements in mind
- Showcased the HOMEE Optimal Planning Engine (H.O.P.E.), a large language model specialized in interior design domain knowledge
- Invited by the National Science and Technology Council and the Taiwan Tech Arena to demonstrate innovative spatial computing technology
- Collaboration with industry leaders such as NVIDIA and Google Cloud to launch a variety of AI solutions, from real estate developers to furniture layout

HOMEE人工智能股份有限公司。

产品：2024年国际消费电子展上的全球首款人工智能室内设计师

- 推出全球首款人工智能室内设计师，利用空间规划技术改革家具行业
- 为家具制造商、房地产开发商和室内设计公司提供基于云的订阅人工智能软件服务
- 允许用户通过手机扫描重新设计房间，人工智能在保持房间尺寸的同时生成新的图片
- 展示了HOMEE最佳规划引擎（H.O.P.E.），这是一个专门针对室内设计领域知识的大型语言模型
- 受国家科学技术委员会和台湾科技馆的邀请，展示创新的空间计算技术
- 与NVIDIA和Google Cloud等行业领导者合作，推出各种人工智能解决方案，从房地产开发到家具布局
